description: Poincaré series (or Molien series) for Gamma_2(1,2)_(2).
references: B. Runge, Codes and Siegel modular forms, Discrete Math. 148 (1996), 175-204, p. 202, last displayed formula.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,1,0,-1,-1,2,-1,-1,0,1,1,-1).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
